## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/osobjectref#see-also)

### [Base Types](/documentation/kernel/osobjectref#base-types)

[`OSSymbol`](/documentation/kernel/ossymbol)OSSymbol wraps a C string in a unique C++ object for use as keys in Libkern collections.[`OSObject`](/documentation/kernel/osobject)OSObject is the concrete root class of the Libkern and I/O Kit C++ class hierarchy.[`OSMetaClass`](/documentation/kernel/osmetaclass)[`OSMetaClassBase`](/documentation/kernel/osmetaclassbase)OSMetaClassBase is the abstract bootstrap class for the Libkern and I/O Kit run-time type information system.[`OSObjectPtr`](/documentation/kernel/osobjectptr)[Additional Types](/documentation/kernel/libkern/data_types/additional_types)Find custom type definitions and pointer types for standard classes.
